# This overrides the default fallback that can be located at:
# http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack-infra/project-config/tree/jenkins/data/bindep-fallback.txt

isc-dhcp-client [platform:ubuntu]
netcat-openbsd [platform:ubuntu]
iputils-arping [platform:ubuntu test]
dhclient [platform:fedora]
arping [platform:fedora test]
